name: Wheels on the bus sing along song games for kids
name_original: Wheels on the bus sing along song games for kids
description:
**Interactive sing along!! (kids can choose the verse over and over again...)
**Educational games!
**Colorful screens and funny animations.


A fun, simple, educational and interactive app for this famous nursery rhyme!

Our app includes a sing along, a simple ABC game and other educational and fun games of colors, shapes and numbers!

The wheels on the bus is a known nursery rhyme kids love and we created this app especially for that reason!
- Interactive sing along: this is the main page of the app where kids, whether they are babies, toddlers, kindergarten or any preschool age, can easily master choosing the verse of the wheels on the bus nursery rhyme. In addition, they will have an avatar kid to follow and rehearse the hand motions accompanying this great nursery rhyme.
- Alphabet game: A simple fun activity where the child practices ABC recognition by pressing the correct letter. Nursery rhymes and alphabet go hand in hand and so we added this activity for your child to enjoy this ABC game.
- Shapes and numbers: The child can also navigate to this part of the app, where he/she can practice recognizing shapes, colors ad numbers with very simple activities

At MotionTale we know kids need fun – but with a purpose and this is why we developed this fun wheels on the bus nursery rhyme app with so many features and games around the sing along function, so kids can have fun, but also play educational games to help establish their alphabet recognition, and encourage them to learn numbers, shapes and colors.

If your child likes Wheels on the bus and other nursery rhymes – please consider our Old McDonald app as well – which also features a sing along and other educational, interactive and fun game for children of all ages. Especially babies, toddlers and preschool kids!

We hope you will consider our Wheels on the bus app – download it for free and let your child sing along and have fun.
We included so many activities- all in this one app – so it’s simple for your kid to enjoy hours of interaction!
